T&C_intro: The following terms and conditions apply to all users of the Nafsi website. By using the website, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.
description_of_services_body: Nafsi offers online mental health consultations with licensed professionals. Our services are not a substitute for traditional in-person mental health care, and we recommend seeking medical attention if you are experiencing a mental health emergency.
eligibility_body: You must be at least 18 years old to use Nafsi's services.
T&C_registration_body: To use our services, you must create an account with Nafsi. You must provide accurate and complete information when registering, including your name, contact information, and payment details. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account information, including your username and password.
T&C_payment_body: You will be charged for each mental health consultation session. Payment must be made in advance of the session.
cancellation_and_refund_policy_body: If you need to cancel a consultation session, you must do so at least 24 hours in advance to receive a full refund. If you cancel within 24 hours of your scheduled session, you will not be eligible for a refund. Refunds may take up to 10 business days to process.
privacy_policy_body: Nafsi is committed to protecting the privacy of our users. We will not share your personal information with any third parties without your consent, except as required by law. For more information, please see
limitation_of_liability_body: Nafsi will not be liable for any damages, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, punitive, and consequential damages, arising from the use of or inability to use our services. Our liability to you for any claim related to our services will be limited to the amount paid by you for the services.
indemnification_body: You agree to indemnify and hold Nafsi and its affiliates, officers, agents, and employees harmless from any claim or demand, including reasonable attorneys' fees, arising out of your use of our services or your violation of these terms and conditions.
termination_body: We reserve the right to terminate your access to our services at any time, without cause or notice.
privacy_terms_body: , I hereby give my consent, acceptance, and understanding of engaging in its services.
law_regulations_body: I acknowledge that I have read and agree to the sharing of my health information through the Health Information Exchange System (NABIDH), in accordance with the regulations of the United Arab Emirates.
consent_for_telemedicine_body1: I acknowledge that I have read
consent_for_telemedicine_body3: and agree to participate in teleconsultation for the service(s)/procedure(s) mentioned.
governing_law_body: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United Arab Emirates.
changes_to_terms_and_conditions_body: Nafsi may update these terms and conditions from time to time without notice. The most current version of the terms and conditions can be found on our website. Your continued use of our services after any changes to these terms and conditions constitutes your acceptance of the changes.

privacy_intro: Welcome to www.NafsiHealth.com ("we," "our," or "us"). We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Telehealth Privacy Policy outlines our practices concerning the collection, use, disclosure, and protection of your personal information when you access and use our telehealth services through our website or mobile application (collectively, the "Service").
by_using_service: By using our Service, you consent to the practices described in this Telehealth Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with the terms of this policy, please do not access or use our Service.
personal_info_intro: In the course of providing our telehealth services, we may collect the following types of personal information about you:
personal_info_a: a) Contact Information: Your name, email address, phone number, and other contact details.
personal_info_b: b) Demographic Information: Such as your age, gender, date of birth, and location.
personal_info_c: c) Medical Information: Information about your health condition, medical history and other medical data that you provide to our healthcare professionals during telehealth consultations.
personal_info_d: d) Payment Information: Billing and payment details, including credit card or other payment method information.
personal_info_e: e) Communications: Any information that you provide when you contact us or our healthcare professionals through the Service.
non_personal_info_desc: We may also collect non-personal information about your interactions with the Service. This information may include your device information, IP address, browser type, and cookies, which are discussed in detail in our Cookie Policy, available at www.Nafsihealth.com/cookies.
how_we_use_your_info_intro: We use your personal information for the following purposes:
how_we_use_your_info_a: a) Providing Telehealth Services: To connect you with our healthcare professionals for telehealth consultations and related services.
how_we_use_your_info_b: b) Communication: To respond to your inquiries, provide updates about our services, and send administrative messages.
how_we_use_your_info_c: c) Improving Our Service: To analyze and improve our Service's functionality, content, and user experience.
how_we_use_your_info_d: d) Payment Processing: To process payments for services rendered.
how_we_use_your_info_e: e) Legal Compliance: To comply with applicable laws and regulations.
how_we_share_your_information_intro: We may share your personal information in the following circumstances:
how_we_share_your_information_a: a) With Healthcare Professionals: To facilitate telehealth consultations, we may share your medical information with our licensed healthcare professionals who are involved in providing you with the requested services.
how_we_share_your_information_b: b) Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our Service, processing payments, or providing other related services.
how_we_share_your_information_c: c) Legal Compliance: We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to a valid legal process, such as a court order.
security_of_your_information_desc: We take reasonable measures to safeguard your personal information against unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
your_choices_rights_desc: You have certain rights regarding your personal information, including the right to access, correct, or delete your data. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at info[at]nafsihealth.com.
changes_privacy_policy_desc: We may update this Telehealth Privacy Policy from time to time. The most current version will always be available on our website www.Nafsihealth.com. We will notify you of any material changes through the Service or by other means.
contact_us_pricacy_desc: If you have any questions or concerns about this Telehealth Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at
cookies_intro: Welcome to Nafsihealth.com ("we," "our," or "us"). This Cookies Policy explains how we use cookies   our telehealth website (the "Website"). By using the Website, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy.
what_are_cookies_desc: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when you visit the Website. They serve various purposes, such as helping the Website recognize your device, remember your preferences, and analyze how you interact with the Website.
types_of_cookies_we_use_a: a) Necessary Cookies: These cookies are essential for the Website's basic functionalities, such as enabling you to navigate the site and access secure areas. They do not collect any personal information.
types_of_cookies_we_use_b: b) Analytics Cookies: We use analytics cookies to gather information about how visitors use the Website. This data helps us improve the Website's performance and user experience. The information collected is aggregated and anonymized.
types_of_cookies_we_use_c: c) Functionality Cookies: Functionality cookies allow the Website to remember your preferences and choices (e.g., language, region) to provide a personalized experience.
third_party_cookies_desc: We may also use third-party cookies provided by trusted partners to ensure services function properly
managing_cookies_desc: You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings. Most web browsers allow you to delete or block cookies. However, blocking certain cookies may affect your ability to access or use certain parts of the Website.
your_consent_desc: By continuing to use the Website, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this Cookies Policy. If you do not agree to the use of cookies, please adjust your browser settings or refrain from using the Website.
changes_cookies_policy_desc: We may update this Cookies Policy from time to time. The most current version will always be available on our Website. We will notify you of any material changes through the Website or by other means.
disclaimer_body_1: The mental telehealth consultation services provided on www.Nafsihealth.com (the "Website") are intended to offer general support, guidance, and information related to mental health. The content and information provided during these consultations are not a substitute for traditional mental health evaluation, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of a qualified mental health professional or healthcare provider for any mental health concerns or emergency.
disclaimer_body_2: The mental health professionals providing telehealth consultations through this Website are licensed and experienced in their respective fields. However, the information provided during telehealth consultations is based on the information provided by you, the client, and may not always capture the full context or nuances of your situation.
disclaimer_body_3: Telehealth consultations may not be appropriate for all mental health issues or emergencies. If you are experiencing a mental health crisis or if you believe you are a danger to yourself or others, please contact emergency services.
disclaimer_body_4: By engaging in a mental telehealth consultation, you acknowledge and understand the inherent risks associated with telehealth, including but not limited to technical issues, interruptions, and breaches of security. While we take reasonable measures to protect the security and confidentiality of your personal information, we cannot guarantee the security of electronic communications.
disclaimer_body_5: The content and advice provided during mental telehealth consultations are not intended to create a therapeutic relationship between you and the mental health professional. If you wish to establish a formal client-therapist relationship, you must follow the appropriate procedures and guidelines outlined by the mental health professional.
disclaimer_body_6: The information presented on this Website may be updated or modified without notice. We make no warranties or representations about the accuracy, completeness, or effectiveness of the advice provided during telehealth consultations.
disclaimer_body_7: In no event shall www.NafsiHealth.com or its affiliates, directors, officers, employees, or agents be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with the use of mental telehealth consultations or reliance on the content provided on this Website.
disclaimer_body_8: By using this Website and engaging in mental telehealth consultations, you agree to indemnify and hold harmless www.Nafsihealth.com and its affiliates from any and all claims, liabilities, damages, costs, and expenses, including attorney fees, arising from your use of mental telehealth services or your reliance on the information provided on this Website.

faq_how_nafsi_work_ans:
After creating your personal account on Nafsi platform, we will help you find the therapist best suitable for you by asking you some questions to identify your needs, preferences, and the issues you are dealing with; Alternatively, you can browse our doctorsâ€™ profiles and select the therapist you believe is right for you. 
Once you match with a therapist, you can schedule a chat, phone or video session at any available slots convenient for you.
faq_how_will_communicate: 2. How will I communicate with my therapist?
faq_how_will_communicate_ans:
You can get therapy by:
1. exchanging messages with your therapist
2. Chatting live with your therapist
3. Speaking over the phone with your therapist
4. Video conferencing with your therapist
faq_why_choose_nafsi_ans: Our passionate and compassionate professionals are driven by the mission of helping people live better and happier life every day. So, if you seek to improve the quality of your life, or there is something that affects your happiness and prevents you from achieving your goals, our therapist will be able to help you.
faq_what_conditions_does_nafsi_treat_ans: Our therapists specialize in providing consultation and professional help for a wide range of issues, including stress, anxiety, depression, grief, trauma, anger, addictions, sleeping disorders, parenting difficulties, relationship problems, family conflicts, and more.
faq_does_nafsi_for_children: 5. Does Nafsi offer mental health services for children?
faq_does_nafsi_for_children_ans: Yes, we have a child and adolescent psychiatrists who can treat patients with developmental disorders, ADHD and other conditions.
faq_how_long_can_i_use_nafsi: 6. How long can I use Nafsi?
faq_how_long_can_i_use_nafsi_ans: You can use Nafsi for as long as you need. Some people may feel better after a few sessions, while others may require regular sessions for an extended period
consent_purpose: 1. Purpose: To obtain your consent to participate in a teleconsultation in connection with the following service(s) and/or procedure(s)
consent_purpose_fourth: - Output data from medical devices and sound and video files
electronic_systems_description: Electronic systems used will incorporate network and software security protocols to protect confidentiality of patient identification and imaging data and will ncludemeasures to safeguard the data and to ensure its integrity against intentional and unintentional corruption in accordance with UAE Laws and Regulations.
nature_of_teleconsultation: 3. Nature of Teleconsultation: During the teleconsultation
nature_of_teleconsultation_first: a) Details of your medical history, examinations, x-rays and tests may be discussed with other healthcare professionals with interactive videos, audio and telecommunication technology.
nature_of_teleconsultation_second: b) A physical examination may need to take place.
nature_of_teleconsultation_third: c) A non-medical technical person may be present in the telehealth studio to aid in the video transmission.
nature_of_teleconsultation_fourth: d) Audio and/or photo recordings may be taken for accurate diagnosis, treatment and quality control.
medical_information_description: All existing federal laws and local regulations/policies/guidelines regarding access to medical information and copies of your Health Records apply to this teleconsultation. Dissemination of any patient identifiable images or information for this telehealth interaction to other entities will not take place without your consent.
confidentiality_description: Responsible and appropriate efforts have been made to eliminate any confidentiality risks associated with the teleconsultation and all existing confidentiality protections under UAE federal laws and local regulation apply to information disclosed during this teleconsultation.
rights_description: You may withhold or withdraw consent to teleconsultation at any time without affecting your right to future care or treatment.
disputes_description: You agree that any disputes that arise from the teleconsultation will be resolved as per UAE laws and regulations and will be raised with the telehealth provider in the first instance.
expected_benefits_first: a) Improves access to medical care by enabling a patient to remain in their home, office (or a remote site) while your DHA licensed physician obtains test results and consults with other DHA licensed physicians at distant/ other sites.
expected_benefits_second: b) More efficient medical evaluation and management.
expected_benefits_third: c) Access to expertise from distant specialist in the UAE or experts outside.
possible_risks_description: As with any medical procedures there are potential risks associated with the use of telehealth, which may include, but not limited to the following:
possible_risks_first: a) Information transmission may not be sufficient (e.g. poor resolution of images) to allow appropriate decision making by the consulted physician.
possible_risks_second: b) Delays in medical evaluation and treatment could occur due to deficiencies or failure of equipment.
possible_risks_third: c) In rare instances, security protocol could fail causing a breach of privacy of personal medical information.
possible_risks_fourth: d) In rare cases, a lack of access to complete health records may result in adverse drug interactions, allergic reactions, or other judgement errors.
expected_benefits_and_possible_risks_des: You have been advised of all the risks, consequences and benefits of telehealth. Your treating physician has discussed with you the information provided in a language you can understand. You have had the opportunity to ask questions about the information presented in this form and about the teleconsultation. All your questions have been answered and you understand the written information provided above.
for_unique_mental: For your unique mental wellness journey
specialists_section_title: Making mental health care accessible to all, anytime, anywhere
specialists_section_desc: NAFSI uses innovative telemedicine to guarantee that people all over the world have access to professional mental health care, leading to happier, healthier, and more balanced lives for all.
strengthen_relationship: Strengthen Your Relationship Through Couple Therapy
strengthen_relationship_first: Couple therapy delivered through online platforms is a dynamic and innovative way for couples to address relationship challenges, improve communication, and fortify their emotional connection with the guidance of trained therapists.
strengthen_relationship_second: This fosters a supportive and effective space for couples to navigate their issues and work toward a healthier, more fulfilling relationship.
pick_preferred_date_time: Pick your preferred Date and Time:
match_right_doctor: Try to match your case with the right doctor
individual_therapy_title: Start Your Path to Personal Wellness with Individual Therapy
individual_therapy_desc_first: A confidential and personalized process where a trained therapist works one-on-one with a client to address emotional, psychological, or behavioral challenges.
individual_therapy_desc_second: It offers a safe space for clients to explore their thoughts and feelings, aiming to improve their mental well-being and personal growth through tailored support and guidance.
psychiatry_title: Achieve Inner Peace through Psychiatric Therapy
psychiatry_desc_first: Psychiatric therapy conducted through online platforms has revolutionized mental healthcare by giving people access to qualified psychiatrists and providing a wide range of therapeutic modalities and evidence-based treatments that address various mental health needs.
psychiatry_desc_second: This enables clients to receive individualized, convenient, and effective care from the comfort of their own homes while ensuring privacy, reducing geographical constraints, and improving the overall accessibility of mental health support.
complete_journey: Complete journey on Nafsi for online consultation
complete_steps_on_nafsi: Complete these steps on Nafsi for online consultation
do_you_have_insurance: Do you have Insurance with us?
get_started_questions_title: When registering on a telemedicine platform, it's crucial to know about our patients to provide them with the best care possible.
get_started_questions_desc: Please answer the below questions to help us gather important information about your background, needs, and preferences and ensure a more personalized and patient-centered experience.

upload_eid_message: Upload a photo of your open Emirates ID. It is important that the picture is bright and clear, and that all the corners of the document are visible.
data_updated: Your data has been updated successfully!
nafsi_brief: The NAFSI platform is built from the ground up with simplicity, safety, and efficiency in mind. There should be no compromises on your healing journey, and NAFSI is here for a better you! Our help desk is here 24/7 to answer any questions or concerns you may have.
have_you_ever_been_therapy_before: 4. Have you ever been in therapy before?
what_led_therapy_today: 5. What led you to consider therapy today?
my_mood_is_interfering_with: My mood is interfering with my job or school performance
struggle_with_building: I struggle with building or maintaining relationships
purpose_my_life: I canâ€™t find purpose and meaning in my life
experienced_traumatic_experience: I have experienced a traumatic experience
need_specific_challenge: I need to talk through a specific challenge
want_to_improve_myself: I want to improve myself but donâ€™t know where to start
recommended_by_someone: It was recommended to me by someone (family, friend, doctor)
what_your_expectations_therapist: 6. What are your expectations from your therapist? A therapist who will
how_rate_physical_health: 7. How would you rate your current physical health?
how_rate_eating_habits: 8. How would you rate your current eating habits?
areyou_bothered_following_problems: 9. Are you currently being bothered by any of the following problems?
interest_doing_things: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
trouble_falling_asleep: Trouble falling asleep, staying asleep, or sleeping too much
feeling_tired: Feeling tired or having little energy
excessive_worry: Excessive worry, fear, or panic attacks
trouble_concentrating: Trouble concentrating, making decisions, or remembering things
social_withdrawal: Social withdrawal or isolation from friends and family

anxiety_disorders: Anxiety disorders such as generalized anxiety disorders, social anxiety disorders, panic disorders, and phobias
do_you_have_family_history: 11. Do you have a family history of mental health conditions? If so, please provide details.
have_you_experienced_life_changes: 12. Have you experienced any recent major life changes or stressors, such as a loss of a loved one, relationship problems, job changes, or financial difficulties? If so, please provide details.
how_communicate_with_your_therapist: 13. How do you prefer to communicate online with your therapist?
try_match_right_doctor: Try to match your case with the right doctor
about_e_health_desc1: E-Health, at its core, is the application of Technology to medical practice by combining medical records and all health-related services in one place.
about_e_health_desc2: Telemedicine is a type of e-health that enables remote patient assessment, diagnosis, and treatment. Whether you're at home or away on business, telemedicine makes it possible to connect with a doctor whenever and wherever you need one.
about_nafsi_desc: At NAFSI, we are among the first to implement these novel approaches to patient care in the UAE. Our platform is driven by an authorised healthcare Zoom online consultation licence! This implies that all of your medical consultations can take place via a channel that is both safe and compliant.
our_commitment_to_compliance_desc1: Our platform is dedicated to building a foundation of strict compliance security and protecting the privacy of medical records and doctor-patient conversations.
our_commitment_to_compliance_desc2: NAFSI is fully compliant with all applicable international and regional regulatory frameworks, and we consistently go above and beyond the requirements set forth by:
HIPAA: HIPAA (Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act).
TDRA: TDRA (Telecommunications and Digital Government Regulatory Authority).
utmost_patient_doctor_confidentiality_de: Your interactions with your therapist will always be held in the strictest confidence. Encrypted from beginning to end your health and personal information are safe during all consultations and follow-up care!
robust_data_protection_protocols_desc: Going beyond meeting regulatory requirements, we've fortified our data safety measures by implementing multiple layers of protection, multi-factor authentication for users to encrypted backups. This gives you confidence in each appointment since you know your medical records are safe with NAFSI!
setup_consultation_desc: Plan to see your therapist of choice at your earliest convenience.
verify_submit_desc: Simply sign in to NAFSI at the appointed time. Your Zoom consultation access link can be found in your user dashboard. There's no need for any third-party applications or extra accounts.
join_your_session_desc: Simply sign in to NAFSI at the appointed time. Your Zoom consultation access link can be found in your user dashboard. There's no need for any third-party applications or extra accounts.
your_Journey_with_nafsi_desc: You won't have to worry about switching between apps or navigating complicated procedures. By incorporating the Zoom meeting into our platform, we guarantee a smooth and efficient user experience.
booking_desc: Appointment scheduling is a breeze once you've logged in! Time slots for each psychologist will be displayed on the platform, allowing you to select a convenient time.
rescheduling_desc: Plans may need to be adjusted, and that's fine! Simply head to your dashboard, select the appointment, and select 'Reschedule' to move it to an alternative time and day- and you'll be all set. Rescheduling must be submitted at least 24 hours in advance.
cancelling_desc: Until Next time! To cancel an appointment, just go to your dashboard, choose the appointment, and click the "Cancel" button. Cancellations should be made at least 24 hours in advance for the consideration of our medical staff.
email_services_desc: NAFSI uses both (SMS) and email to keep you informed because we know how important it is for you to always be up-to-date.
appointment_confirmations_desc: Â§ Confirmations for scheduled consultations are sent through text messages and email, outlining the scheduled time and date.
reminders_desc: To help you remember your scheduled consultation, we'll send you a text message and an email 24 hours beforehand.
alerts_and_notifications_desc: Changes and updates will be sent to you via text message and mail promptly.
recommendations_for_you_desc: Your user dashboard isn't a static page; rather, it responds in real-time to your specific health requirements. NAFSI will provide you with helpful suggestions and recommendations before joining your booked therapy session based on your medical history and the specialist you are planning to speak with.
tailored_healthcare_desc: If you're not sure what kind of medical expert you need, the dashboard can point you in the right direction. It will make suggestions for specialists and therapies based on the symptoms and issues you input!
informed_decisions_desc: To make sure you're prepared for your appointment, your NAFSI dashboard may recommend reading some of our articles related to you. This will provide you with the background information you need to have a meaningful conversation with your therapist.
daily_tips_desc: NAFSI will provide you with tips designed specifically to promote and improve your emotional health and well-being, from mindfulness training stress reduction strategies to methods for bettering the quality of sleep.
support_desc: The NAFSI platform is built from the ground up with simplicity, safety, and efficiency in mind. There should be no compromises on your healing journey, and NAFSI is here for a better you! Our help desk is here 24/7 to answer any questions or concerns you may have.
your_patient_dashboard_title: Your patient dashboard is your very own command Centre on NAFSI
view_appointments_desc: Check Your Schedule Quickly and view both your current and past consultations.
appointment_administration_desc: Change appointment dates and times or cancel as needed.
appointment_history_desc: Access medications, notes, and transcripts from previous appointments.
profile_settings_desc: Adjust your profile settings to reflect any changes to your name, address, phone number, email address, or health information.
try_match_right_issue: Try to match your case with the right issue
passwrod_must_at_least: Passwrod must contain at least 8 characters
password_must_contain: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 number, and 1 special characters
internet_speed_desc: Ensure you have a minimum internet speed of 2 MB/s.
appropriate_setting_desc: Make sure to attend the consultation in a quiet and convenient place or room.
immediate_support_desc1: If you face any issue before or during the consultation, you can immediately call
immediate_support_desc2: or submit your issue in the reported issue section.
laptopd_desktop_device_instructions_desc: If you are using a laptop or desktop device, be sure to test and enable the Microphone and Camera if you want to join video with your therapist on your browser (Microsoft Edge, Chrome, Firefox, or Safari).

adult_therapy_title: Start Your Path to Personal Wellness with Adult Therapy
teen_therapy_title: Achieve Inner Peace through Teen Therapy
teen_therapy_desc1: Teen therapy conducted through an online platform is a form of mental health treatment that leverages internet-based technology to deliver counseling and support to adolescents to address the unique emotional, social, and psychological challenges they often face during their transitional years.
teen_therapy_desc2: This innovative approach enables licensed therapists to engage with teenage clients remotely, offering a convenient and confidential avenue for addressing a wide range of emotional and psychological issues, such as depression, anxiety, and self-esteem issues.
